name: 歩く戦車戦士 - Walking Tank Warrior
name_original: 歩く戦車戦士 - Walking Tank Warrior
description:
歩く戦車戦士  -  Walking Tank Warrior
Episode 17 - Why can't we have nice things?

Step into a random episode of the hit mech anime,
歩く戦車戦士  -  Walking Tank Warrior!

WARNING: Contains Mature Themes of Violent and Sexual Nature

After the 665th seal is broken, troops are deployed to take control of the Disciple Program's Pilots and Walking Tank Warriors.

Chō is caught off guard in the shower, Keiko is having a mental breakdown and Akari is having none of it! Tune in for this new episode! 

Walking Tank Warrior is a 3rd person action adventure similar to older PS1 titles such as Love & Destroy. It is structered as an Anime episode in homage to series like Neon Genesis Evangelion, Gundam and RahXephon!

Features: 

  • Pilot the eponymous Walking Tank Warrior as Chō
  • Take the fight to the Mechs in the city 
  • 2 full 3rd person action levels
  • Anime styled cutscenes

Created By
Stuart Wright - Director
Akina Boudry - Script Translator / Writer
Jing Hua - Mech Design
El Pablo - Music Composition / Sound Design
Gustavo Toscan - Music Composition
Tyler Dori / Rogue Cache - Logo Design / Modeling

revoca terram et salvam humanitatem
